meanings.definition: A type of pesticide used to control pests in agriculture.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use metaldehydes to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent2: The metaldehydes were sprayed on the fields to keep the pests away.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous pests were no match for the powerful metaldehydes!
meanings.sent4: The metaldehydes acted like a shield, guarding the plants from unwanted visitors.
meanings.sent5: The fields were safe and sound, thanks to the mighty metaldehydes at work.
